I’m easily scared by gore and violence\, but I felt like I had to experience this story for myself from start to finish\, because it’s rare that we get to experience the cycle of revenge so intimately. I was happy (and sad) to explore this theme with the characters of this grim world. Ashley’s performance as Ellie is still spot on\, and the addition of Abby (Laura Bailey) adds a whole new layer to this story. This game asks many questions that I often ask myself\, especially about the thin line between justice and vengeance\, and about the people who are left behind. My favorite quote comes very far in the game and encapsulates everything that I took away from The Last of Us: “I don’t think I can ever forgive you for that.
